summary: This is a brief email from July 25, 2019, alerting recipients that NBC 4 will run a story about Jeffrey Epstein, reporting that he was either attacked or attempted to hurt himself. The sender declined to comment and did not confirm the information.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The email states that NBC 4 will run a story about him, reporting he was either attacked or attempted to hurt himself.

events.title: NBC 4 story about Epstein incident
events.description: NBC 4 will run a story reporting that Jeffrey Epstein was either attacked or attempted to hurt himself.

keyFacts: An email dated July 25, 2019, alerts recipients to an upcoming NBC 4 news story about Jeffrey Epstein.
The story's reported claim is that Epstein was either attacked or attempted to hurt himself.
The sender of the email declined to comment and did not confirm the information in the story.
